name: Doomed Sportsman's ad
description: 2-4 Player Deathmatch ONLY Layout of two connected rooms with a Temple in the main room filled with the goodies(BFG9000, MegaSphere). The Temple has a tricky, push the button and run sequence to get in. This wad contains only a few of each WeApOn & has many strategicaly placed sniper spots. Fast paced and lots-of-FRAGS!!!
